name: Pike
body:
Pike
====

Pike is a (nearly) pure-Python framework for writing SMB2 and SMB3 protocol correctness tests.  See the [GitHub project](https://github.com/emc-isilon/pike) for code, installation instructions, and license information.

Additional Information
======================

* [API documentation](api/index.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
